name: server
description: PostsHit is an anonymous community platform where users can anonymously post content, like/dislike posts, challenge others, and join or create groups to share and collaborate on projects. Built using **Next.js** for the frontend and **Node.js** for the backend, the platform offers a fast, scalable experience. The backend is powered by **PostgreSQL** and **Prisma ORM** for seamless database interactions
author: Priyanshu Routh and Subhrajit Dutta (5 years Plan)
